idea-plugin.name: Nextflow Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
Complete language support for Nextflow scripts and configuration files using LSP4IJ and the Nextflow Language Server.
Features: - Syntax highlighting and file type recognition - Code completion with intelligent suggestions - Go to definition and find references - Hover documentation for functions and variables - Real-time error diagnostics and validation - Code formatting and semantic highlighting - DAG preview for workflows
Requires the Nextflow Language Server to be installed.

server.name: Nextflow Language Server
server.description: Language Server for Nextflow scripts and configuration files
